catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Eda Glass
catentdesc.shortdescription: Short beverage glass with wide mouth.
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece short beverage glass made from high quality glass. Slim at the bottom and wider at the top this glass funnels the bouquet very well. A great design from KitchenComfort.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Chai Teapot
catentdesc.shortdescription: All glass teapot with wall thermo.
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern, all glass kettle made from borosilicate glass to make it heat proof. It has a double wall thermo to keep drink hot. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Kai Cutlery
catentdesc.longdescription: 20 piece plain traditional silver cutlery set consisting of spoon, fork, knife, tea spoon and dessert fork. Made from stainless steel, rust free forever guaranteed.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Blanche Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 12 piece bone china flat square plates. Plates are dishwasher and microwave safe. Modern design in white colors makes it perfect for everyday use.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Mason Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 12 piece traditional white bone china dinner plate with bold black band. The plates are microwave, freezer and dishwasher safe. White traditional design for a classy table set up.

catentdesc.name: Burleign Bianca Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece prestige bone china dinner plate with a thin gold band for that touch of class. Traditional design, suitable for parties with vip guests. Safe for freezer and dishwasher.

catentdesc.name: Burleign Duchessa Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece unique design porcelain dinner plates. Very light weight but durable. Simple white design. Plates are dishwasher safe, microwave safe and freezer safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Cardony Glass
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece short oval seamless wine glass. Made with high quality glass. Classy immaculate design, perfect for parties. Safe in dishwasher.

catentdesc.name: Burleign Flareteapot
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 cup traditional glossy red stoneware teapot. Comes in a glossy red color and an affordable price tag. Dishwasher and microwave safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Vienna Glass
catentdesc.longdescription: 12 piece tall cocktail glass. Holds 8oz liquid. Don't let the price tag fool you, the glasses look and feel great. Can be used at parties or just everyday purpose. Dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Kryst Cupset
catentdesc.longdescription: 12 piece crystal tea cup set. Capacity of 2oz. These clear teacups gives you an elite feeling and makes tea time experience fun. Dishwasher safe and microwave safe.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Halo Wine Glass
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece thick base tumbler shape wine glass with blue accent. The tint and design makes the glasses stand out. They are very durable and holds 6oz. Glasses are dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Boch Cutlery Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: 60 piece stainless steel table cutlery set.
catentdesc.longdescription: 60 piece stainless steel cutlery set with beautiful design on the handles. Set comprises of 6 of table spoon, fork, knife, dessert knives, spoon, pastry fork, teaspoon, butter knife.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Truffle Set
catentdesc.longdescription: Box of 2. These 6oz glasses are made exclusively for white wine. The generous size and the classic design make it well suited for swirling and holding. Microwave safe.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Divino Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 4 piece wine glass set. This shape of glass is used by professional tasters as well as people who enjoy drinking wine everyday. Contemporary design. Dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Divina Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 4 piece wine glass set. Well suited for red and white wine. The glasses are specifically made to capture the bouquet. Dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Faire Rouler Glass Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece balloon wine shape glass. Simply adding a splash of red wine on this drudgery bowl makes this oversized wine big on style. Dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Imm Wine Glass
catentdesc.longdescription: Medium sized wine glass perfect for any party. Durable and cheap, affordable design. Great for people who drink wine occasionally.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Siai Mug
catentdesc.longdescription: 4 piece blue/white mugs are made out of ceramic. The glossy blue finish gives it a lively touch. Made from high quality ceramic makes it very durable. Has a capacity of 12oz. Dishwasher and microwave safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Mugs
catentdesc.longdescription: High grade porcelain mug. Specifically designed in this shape to give a better grip to the mug. Great for use in office, or to give as a gift to a friend with a personal note. Dishwasher and microwave safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Paula Teacup Set
catentdesc.longdescription: Wide mouth teacup made out of porcelain. The cups are designed to give a more filling experience, while you enjoy your daily cup of tea. Great for everyday use. Dishwasher safe and microwave safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Almherst Teacup Set
catentdesc.longdescription: Porcelain tea cups and saucer are perfect for everyday use. The mini bowl tea cups are exclusively designed to make holding your cup comfortable. Dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Pilsner Glass Set
catentdesc.longdescription: Trumpet shape pilsner glass set made out of durable break resistant glass. These glasses are great for outdoor decks and dinner parties. These 6 piece 12 oz. glasses are designed to have a great grip. Dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Tumbler Glass Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece short tumbler shape glasses great for use of wine. Great for red and white wine. The shape gives a feeling of elegance when you drink from it. Dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Anna Glass Set
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece wide tumbler glass set. These glasses are crafted from mouth blown glass which reflects an exceptional taste. They are perfect for mixer and everyday beverages. Dishwasher safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Mika Tea Set
catentdesc.longdescription: Includes: 2 cups, 2 saucer, 1 covered sugar bowl, 1 creamer and 1 teapot. There are uniquely shaped to add a touch of elegance. Perfect for casual and formal use. Dishwasher safe and microwave safe.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Silvano Cutlery Set
catentdesc.longdescription: Includes: 4 of spoon, fork, knives, dessert fork, teaspoon. The cutlery set has graceful and delicate lines giving it a traditional style. Ideal for everyday use.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Mugs
catentdesc.longdescription: Artsy white mugs with different colors on the inside . Can be bought together as a set for a showcase display. Good for use as coffee mug.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Via Dinner Set
catentdesc.longdescription: Light weight round porcelain dinner set. 12 piece dinner set, includes 6 dinner plates, 6 side plates. Good for everyday use. Very durable design and chip proof.

catentdesc.name: Cristie Slik Wine Glass
catentdesc.longdescription: A classy wine glass made with a perfect shape to suit the needs of wine experts. Affordable price for a classy wine glass.

catentdesc.name: KitchenComfort Royal Julia Tea Set
catentdesc.shortdescription: 6 piece bone china tea set with thin gold band.
catentdesc.longdescription: 6 piece prestige bone china tea set with thin gold band. The unique design gives an elegant feel .Set including 2 cup, 2 saucer, 1 teapot and 1 creamer. Chip proof. Dishwasher safe.
